definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The Company is a professional supplier of IC and Xia should be the second triode.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家专业的IC供应商及侠应二三极管。

sentences.english: Extra anode was added to make up a triode.
sentences.chinese: 外加阳极就构成了三极管。
薄膜晶体三极管的缩写。

sentences.english: This type of topology is really only applicable to triodes.
sentences.chinese: 这种线路确实只能在三极管上应用。

sentences.english: Thus further expounds the depth saturated triode equivalent model.
sentences.chinese: 从而进一步阐明深度饱和三极管的等效模型。

sentences.english: This is the output terminal of a thin film transistor.
sentences.chinese: 这是末端一只薄膜晶体三极管的生产。

sentences.english: Test results of TFFEC and triode are described and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了TFFEC和三极管的测试性能。

sentences.english: The signal output end of the triode can also be connected to the primary of the horizontal output transformer.
sentences.chinese: 三极管的信号输出端亦可接到行输出变压器的初级。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
